about_the_game:
Add 34 Kinpatsu Waifus to Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer; in all their natural glory!

34 new sliding puzzles with increasing difficulty to solve.
Be rewarded with an up close view of your Waifus in the gallery!

Add these new spicy Summer Waifus to your collection now with Kinpatsu Waifus Part 3!

content_descriptors.notes: This features Summer Waifus completely nude! There is no sexual acts, just beautiful nude Waifus!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: More than likely will work on requirements less than this.
